body: Oh man I remember reading this 3-4 years ago, it's such a great story
Nice ending, showing all the consequences they did during their adventures.
The ending was surprisingly depressing and bittersweet, but otherwise that was a fun and bizarre story
i keep coming back to this work and many of the artist's others. as i had forgotten to comment here i shall rate this as incredibly wholesome despite some of the funky bits that appear here lol

Hm about the ending I think there were two meanings to this meaning 1.No matter what happen there going to be an oppressive power(seeing at first the Oni/the men oppressed woman then the opposite happen when the one lost power) and humanity is doomed to fail so like the girls in the ending just enjoy life as much as you can while it's still around 2. This is the antithesis to my first meaning and most likely the actual messages due to Japanese culture on the community if you keep ignoring the problem to focus on your happiness the world outside you going to fall to ruin
Gesundheit's sense of humor is the best, 10/10.
It's kinda like the og dragonball
Sins from the past finally catch up with the present. Trade the whole world for your own happiness. Its a wild ride
wow, that was a wild ride. But their happiness are traded by the world going into chaos. lmao

I keep coming back to this one. Gesundheit will always be one of my favorite artists. The guy is the Kentaro Miura of hentai.

Wow, I can't believe I never found this until today, this is definitely one of my favorites of all time. I had to reread chapter 6 to fully understand what happened. And the ending is bittersweet. Two neutral parties collide with a warring good party and evil party, with both the good and evil being destroyed and the neutral parties both achieve their goals and life goes on. In conclusion I would probably this is my second favorite Hentai (#1 being 332847)

This was a great, wish i could applaud the creator directly for this. Although its not without its problems, this could easily have been 1 oni per chapter, as well as the chapter 3 backstory, chapter 4 and 5 are very rushed and the way they just showed and concluded 6/8 onis in one chapter didn't sit right with me. Also the watcher android shouldn't have been turned into a dude at the end imo, but a body is better then living in a sack
I read the whole thing in 3 sessions, came only twice and felt satisfied. Kudos to this playful mangaka for the art and story.

Yep. Meet the new boss, he's just like the old boss. The base nature of humanity is such that there will always be a rapist and a rapee. The only things that change are minor variations of the who and why. Rape women  because reason A. Castrate men because reason B. Enslave blondes because reason C. As long as one group can subjugate another and benefit from it we will find a way to justify it.

Kind of a downer end. The author made the residents of Oni Island sympathetic enough that seeing their streets littered with raped corpses is just unpleasant, especially since our heroes did that. Although, Grandma is okay now so all is right, I guess.

Also, while everything about the final Oni being off-screened is hilarious. I feel kinda cheated out of a more cathartic retribution.
I loved this
Okay no. I came for an orgasm, and now I'm crying because I'm literally a pussy who cries at everything. Fuckkkkk yoouuuu.

Oh, so the title Happily Ever After was just sarcasm. At the end of the day, the war between the Oni and the humans ends in a stalemate. Both the Oni leaders and their enemies, the women who formed a society out of the humans that they experimented on and stole their island, end up getting wiped out. And though all of them die, the world stays the same dumpster fire its always been because humans suck. The cities that were freed from Oni control carry on as they always have, except that the slaves have now become the masters and vice versa. The only people that actually get a happily ever after, are the heroes, and that's only because they weren't heroes at all, but self-interested assholes, traveling from town to town, killing Oni only because they needed the energy to live, and moving on without a care in the world for what happened to the people they left behind, because fuck it, Momo only came for the cure, and the girls are tagging along with her for selfish reasons of their own.
Comedy, Action
